block.p: Rebecca Marie Lowell, a daughter of Jacqueline L. Lowell and Thomas J. Lowell of Barnstable, Mass., was married yesterday to John Jacob Edwards III, a son of Glorine Dobbins Edwards of New York and Mr. Edwards Jr. of Fearrington Village, N.C. The Rev. Marek Chmurski performed the ceremony at Our Lady of Victory Roman Catholic Church in Centerville, Mass.

Mrs. Edwards, 27, is the circulation marketing manager for The Wall Street Journal. She graduated from Georgetown University and received an M.B.A. from Fordham. Her father is a senior consultant for online banking systems and bank management systems at ADS Financial Services Solutions, a software development company in Quincy, Mass. Her mother is a teacher's assistant at Kenneth C. Coombs Elementary School in Mashpee, Mass., where she works with autistic children.

Rebecca Marie Lowell, a daughter of Jacqueline L. Lowell and Thomas J. Lowell of Barnstable, Mass., was married yesterday to John Jacob Edwards III, a son of Glorine Dobbins Edwards of New York and Mr. Edwards Jr. of Fearrington Village, N.C. The Rev. Marek Chmurski performed the ceremony at Our Lady of Victory Roman Catholic Church in Centerville, Mass.

Mrs. Edwards, 27, is the circulation marketing manager for The Wall Street Journal. She graduated from Georgetown University and received an M.B.A. from Fordham. Her father is a senior consultant for online banking systems and bank management systems at ADS Financial Services Solutions, a software development company in Quincy, Mass. Her mother is a teacher's assistant at Kenneth C. Coombs Elementary School in Mashpee, Mass., where she works with autistic children.

Mr. Edwards, 30, is an assistant managing editor of TheStreet.com, a financial news Web site. He graduated from Northwestern. His mother is an independent early-childhood education consultant in New York. His father, who retired as a planner in the Durham City/County Planning Department, in North Carolina, now teaches special needs children in the fifth and sixth grades at Horton Middle School in Pittsboro, N.C.
